alert.note: Alert for La Crosse; Vernon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 12:24AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern La Crosse and western Vernon Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 1223 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stoddard, or 8 miles southeast of La Crosse, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Coon Valley around 1250 AM CDT. Westby around 125 AM CDT. Viroqua around 130 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
